tuv.seg: Question time in Dáil Éireann
Tráth na gceisteanna i nDáil Éireann

Dáil Éireann allocates a certain amount of time on Tuesdays, Wednesdays and Thursdays during which deputies (TDs) may ask questions of members of the Government relating to public affairs connected with their departments or on matters of administration for whch they are officially responsible

Cuireann Dáil Éireann méid áirithe ama ar leataobh ar an Máirt, an Chéadaoin agus Déardaoin d’fhonn gur féidir le teachtaí dála (TDanna) ceisteanna a chur ar chomhaltaí an Rialtais a bhaineann le gnóthaí poiblí maidir lena rannóga nó le ceisteanna riaracháin a bhfuil freagracht oifigiúil orthu ina leith
The questions are referred to as parliamentary questions or PQs
Tugtar ceisteanna parlaiminteacha nó cpanna ar na ceisteanna
The Taoiseach answers questions on Tuesdays in respect of matters relating to the administration of his own department
Freagraíonn an Taoiseach ceisteanna ar an Máirt maidir le ceisteanna a bhaineann le riar a rannóige féin
Other members of the Government reply to questions on an agreed rota basis
Freagraíonn comhaltaí eile an Rialtais ceisteanna ar bhonn uainchlár comhaontaithe
The rota repeats itself every 5 weeks or so, giving the opportunity to Deputies to question each minister on a regular basis
Atosaítear an t-uainchlár gach 5 seachtaine nó mar sin de, agus tugtar an deis do na Teachtaí Dála chun ceist a chur ar gach aire ar bhonn rialta
Currently, the Minister for Health sends questions referring to the executive function of the health service to the HSE for reply
Faoi láthair, seolann an tAire Sláinte ceisteanna a bhaineann le feidhm feidhmiúcháin na seirbhíse sláinte chuig FSS go dtabharfar freagra orthu
TDs are limited to asking each minister 2 oral questions
Cuirtear teorainn ar TDanna gan ach 2 cheist ó bhéal a chur ar gach aire
Every day, 5 oral questions are given priority
Gach lá, tugtar tús áite do 5 cheist ó bhéal
The priority questions are shared between the parties according to party strength
Déantar na ceisteanna a dtugtar tús áite dóibh a roinnt idir na páirtithe de réir threise an pháirtí
As well as oral questions in question time, TDs can submit written questions seeking a written answer
Anuas ar cheisteanna ó bhéal le linn thráth na gceisteanna, féadfaidh TDanna ceisteanna scríofa a sheoladh ina lorgaítear freagra scríofa
There is no limit to the amount of written questions that a TD can ask the Government
Ní leagtar aon teorainn ar an méid ceisteanna scríofa ar féidir le TD a chur ar an Rialtas
The member of the Government must be given 3 days' notice for priority oral questions and 4 days' notice for other questions
Ní mór fógra 3 lá a thabhairt don chomhalta Rialtais le haghaidh ceisteanna ó bhéal a dtugtar tús áite dóibh agus fógra 4 lá i dtaobh ceisteanna eile
Sometimes a very urgent matter of public importance will suddenly arise
Tiocfaidh ceist an-phráinneach lena mbaineann tábhacht phoiblí aníos go tobann, amanna
The Ceann Comhairle may accept questions about an urgent issue at very short notice
Féadfaidh an Ceann Comhairle glacadh le ceisteanna faoi shaincheist phráinneach i ndiaidh fógra an-ghearr a fháil
These questions are called "private notice" questions and are taken at the end of question time
Tugtar ceisteanna “fógra phríobháidigh” ar na ceisteanna seo agus glactar leo ag deireadh thráth na gceisteanna
The Oireachtas publishes the replies to parliamentary questions daily as part of the Dáil Debates
Foilsíonn an tOireachtas na freagraí ar na ceisteanna parlaiminteacha gach lá mar chuid de Dhíospóidí na Dála
Dáil debates are published incrementally throughout a sitting day
Foilsítear díospóireachtaí na Dála ar bhonn breisíoch le linn lá suite
All proceedings before 7pm are published before midnight, the remainder being added the following day
Foilsítear gach imeacht roimh 7pm roimh mheán oíche, agus cuirtear an fuílleach díobh leis an lá dar gcionn
Seanad debates are published incrementally on a same day or next day basis
Foilsítear díospóireachtaí an tSeanaid ar bhonn breisíoch ar bonn an lae chéanna nó an lae dar gcionn
Replies to questions tabled by members for written response by ministers are published at the end of each day's Dáil proceedings
Foilsítear freagraí ar cheisteanna a rangaigh comhaltaí le haghaidh freagra i scríbhinn ag Airí ag deireadh gach lá imeachta sa Dáil
The Official Report of each committee meeting is published within a week at latest, but generally within 2 to 3 working days
Foilsítear Tuarascáil Oifigiúil chruinniú gach coiste laistigh de sheachtain ar a dhéanaí, ach is gnách go bhfoilsítear iad laistigh de 2/3 lá oibre
